name.japanese: リリー・エンストマック

keyMoments.title: Lily Enstomach's First Appearance
keyMoments.description: Luffy discovers Lily as a miniature 5mm woman stealing food, revealing she is actually a giant who ate the Mini Mini no Mi Devil Fruit.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of the Z's Ambition Arc's central character and the Mini Mini no Mi Devil Fruit.
keyMoments.quote: I'm Lily Enstomach! I'm actually a giant, but I ate a Devil Fruit that forced me to be small.

keyMoments.title: Mini Mini Full Rebound
keyMoments.description: Lily demonstrates her Devil Fruit power by transforming from 5mm to her full giant size using Mini Mini Full Rebound.
keyMoments.significance: First display of the Mini Mini no Mi's transformation abilities.

keyMoments.title: Lily Reveals Her Father's Story
keyMoments.description: Lily explains she is searching for her father Panz Fry, a giant chef who steals food to feed the starving and has been captured by the Marines.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the motivation and plot for the entire arc.
keyMoments.quote: My father is Panz Fry, a giant cook in the New World famous for his Volcano cooking and giving stolen food to starving people.

abilities.description: Lily transforms from her miniature 5mm size to her full giant form, retaining her giant strength at any size.
Can shrink down to 5mm in height or grow to giant size, and any size in between, while maintaining giant strength regardless of size.

relationships.description: Lily is Panz Fry's daughter and deeply admires her father's cooking and noble actions.

evolutionMoments.description: Lily reveals her father is Panz Fry and she is desperately searching for him.

relationships.description: Lily becomes allies with Luffy and the Straw Hats when they agree to help rescue her father.

evolutionMoments.description: Luffy agrees to help rescue Panz Fry after hearing about his famous cooking.

reveals.information: Ate the Mini Mini no Mi Devil Fruit, allowing size manipulation from 5mm to giant proportions
Daughter of Panz Fry, the famous giant chef
Known as 'Lily the Glutton' for her extreme appetite and habit of stealing food

keyMoments.title: Panz Fry's Story Revealed
keyMoments.description: Lily reveals her father Panz Fry is a giant cook famous for Volcano Cooking who steals food from the World Government to feed starving people, leading to his capture by Vice Admiral Momonga.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Panz Fry's noble character and the motivation for the rescue mission.

keyMoments.title: Panz Fry Spotted in Marine Custody
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hats spot Panz Fry chained on a giant raft being escorted by four Marine ships toward Impel Down.
keyMoments.significance: Visual confirmation of his capture and the target of the rescue operation.

statusHistory.reason: Captured by Vice Admiral Momonga for stealing food from World Government

bounties.reason: Stealing food from Marines and World Government to feed starving people

abilities.description: Expert cooking technique utilizing magma heat to prepare dishes, including his signature Sea Animal Churrasco and Thousand People Paella.

relationships.description: Lily is Panz Fry's daughter who deeply admires his cooking and moral convictions.

evolutionMoments.description: Lily reveals Panz Fry is her father and she is searching desperately for him.

reveals.information: Famous giant chef specializing in Volcano Cooking
Steals food from Marines and World Government to feed starving people
Captured by Vice Admiral Momonga and being transported to Impel Down

keyMoments.title: Ain's First Appearance
keyMoments.description: Ain is introduced commanding a fleet of Neo Marine ships in the New World, revealed to be Z's second-in-command.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of a key Neo Marines officer and future antagonist in One Piece Film Z.

keyMoments.title: Shuzo Challenges Ain's Position
keyMoments.description: Shuzo reveals to Ain his plan to kill Panz Fry to prove himself worthy of replacing her as Z's second-in-command.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the rivalry within the Neo Marines and Ain's high position in the organization.

relationships.description: Shuzo seeks to replace Ain as Z's second-in-command, creating a rivalry within the Neo Marines.

evolutionMoments.description: Shuzo reveals his ambition to replace Ain as Z's second-in-command.

reveals.information: Second-in-command of the Neo Marines under Z
User of the Modo Modo no Mi (Return-Return Fruit), though not demonstrated in this episode

keyMoments.title: Binz's First Appearance
keyMoments.description: Binz appears alongside Ain on a Neo Marine ship, commanding a fleet in the New World.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of a high-ranking Neo Marines officer.

reveals.information: High-ranking officer of the Neo Marines
User of the Mosa Mosa no Mi that allows plant manipulation, though not demonstrated in this episode

keyMoments.title: Shuzo and Alpacacino Debut
keyMoments.description: Shuzo is introduced as a Neo Marine commander with his companion Alpacacino, commanding his own submarine fleet.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of the Z's Ambition Arc's primary antagonist.

keyMoments.title: Shuzo's Plan to Kill Panz Fry
keyMoments.description: Shuzo reveals his ruthless plan to kill Panz Fry to prove himself worthy of replacing Ain as Z's second-in-command.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Shuzo's ambition and sets up the arc's main conflict.
keyMoments.quote: I'm going after Lily's father to kill him so I can replace you as Z's second in command.

abilities.description: Uses his extra joints as a Longarm Tribe member to spin his arms like flails in combat.
First member of the Longarm Tribe shown to use Armament Haki.

relationships.description: Shuzo seeks to replace Ain as Z's second-in-command through ruthless actions.

evolutionMoments.description: Shuzo reveals his plan to kill Panz Fry to prove himself to Z.

relationships.description: Alpacacino is Shuzo's loyal weapon and companion.

evolutionMoments.description: Alpacacino is introduced as Shuzo's bazooka companion.

reveals.information: Neo Marine commander and former Marine Commodore
Member of the Longarm Tribe and first shown to be a former Marine
Seeks to replace Ain as Z's second-in-command

keyMoments.title: Alpacacino's First Appearance
keyMoments.description: Alpacacino is introduced as Shuzo's bazooka that ate a Zoan Devil Fruit, allowing it to transform into an alpaca.
keyMoments.significance: First non-canon inanimate object shown to have eaten a Zoan Devil Fruit.

abilities.description: Can transform between bazooka form and alpaca form due to eating an unnamed Zoan Devil Fruit.
Can willingly shoot cannonballs from his mouth or be used as a normal bazooka.
Can use Armament Haki to increase the destructive power of his cannonballs.

relationships.description: Alpacacino is Shuzo's loyal weapon and pet.

evolutionMoments.description: Introduced as Shuzo's companion and weapon.

reveals.information: Bazooka that ate a Zoan Devil Fruit, first non-canon inanimate object with Zoan powers
Can use Armament Haki despite being an inanimate object
